2. Keep horizontal eye streamline in the searchBox.
3. Only the search button is outstanding with yellow.

maintain user viscosity & increase search click rates.
We spent about one month at the end. Mainly based on the user needs and user habits to
define the entire flight search process. First, the functionality is crutial. It considers a very
general Swedish user group - from the age span, educational level, accessibility, and also
multicultural background. The design has been affirmed by everyone in the company.
Here only main pages and functions displayed, we totally designed about 120 user interfaces
on desktop and tablet to display different function pieces. You are welcomed to visit the live
1. Classify similiar features in one block.
results list at the outstanding position.
3. Make the filter visually to understand and use.
4. Get flight details and travel agencies easily.
Good features to assist the search & increase clickouts.
1. Make search button easier to find .
3. Easier to find and close the feature .
4. The total price with different passenger numbers
1. Divide different parts of function clearly.
2. Users can collapse different parts of function customly.
3. The selected points display in short even it collapsed.
1. Details left aligned replaces middle aligned
format. 2. Highlight the title and crucial information.
3. City, time, and airport name is clearly readable.
4. Flight details and travel agencies entrances are
1. Automatically refresh recent fexible dates & prices.
2. Use red color to indicate holidays.
3. The design style is bigger to increase the
4. Make info priorities meets the user habits.
On the day of Jun 30th 2019, the new desktop and tablet design has been 100% lunched. After one
the clickouts has been relatively lowered while the profit suprisingly increased.
proves the new design did improve the user experience wheich makes it is easier to be used and
undertood. Also there are some feedback from the users said that the design brings them morden,
fresh, and trusty experience. They really like it!
However, the design will still necessarily need to be evaluated and enhanced day by day.
44% users of Flygresor has been active on the desktop and tablet web. Most of the
profit comes from the desktop clickouts.
Keeping the successful clickouts, enhancing the website user interface and arranging
numbers of functionalities while remain keeping the user stickiness and application
consistency is the key requirements of the new website design.
For each module, first analysing competitors; second
assessing the pros and cons of all webs; then
Experience the entire process as a real customer.
Improve and iterate. At the end, deliver the

quick redesign of the old desktop and tablet user interface is
necessary. Although not many new functions required, the task
is urgent (2 weeks) and huge. Simultaneously, keeping the
consistency and enhancing the user experience is the crucial
